definition: flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Steel chisel grassland, pitch surface ground or other soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 使用钢钎在草地，沥青地或其它松软场地上固定篷房。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: Black is runny like, well, oil.
She said they felt like clouds, light and fluffy.
sentences.chinese: 她说那些肌肉就像云朵一样轻柔松软。

sentences.english: In early summer, the turtle digs out a hollow in the soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 初夏，龟在松软的泥地上挖一个洞。

sentences.english: His foot sank slighty into the soft ground.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚稍微陷入松软的地面。

sentences.english: Every stool was looser than the one before, and smelled fouler.
sentences.chinese: 每一条粪便都比前面的更松软，更难闻。

sentences.english: Add a dash of cooking wine and salt. Cook tomatoes and mushrooms are soft and tasty.
sentences.chinese: 倒入一勺料酒和一少许盐，炒至香菇和圣女果松软。

sentences.english: Bake, uncovered, until fork-tender and brown on the edges, about 50 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 不盖盖子，烤大约50分钟，直至松软，边呈褐色。

sentences.english: I walk over the freshly filled-in graves, sneakers sinking into the soft dirt.
sentences.chinese: 我走过刚填平的墓穴，运动鞋没进松软的泥土里。

sentences.english: We walked across the springy grass.
Businesses might want to place softer cushions on chairs in their negotiation rooms.
sentences.chinese: 商家也许想在谈判室放些更松软的坐垫。

sentences.english: Therefore, we must seek the sensation of relaxation and softness.
sentences.chinese: 所以，要在练拳时找这松软的感觉。

sentences.english: They strode over the springy turf.
sentences.chinese: 他们大步走在松软的草皮上。

sentences.english: Drag bits are used most commonly in soft formations .
sentences.chinese: 在松软岩层中最常用的是钢砂钻头。

sentences.english: The road roller crushed the soft dirt.
sentences.chinese: 那台压路机把松软的土碾平了。

definition: loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
